frameset.edef: to contain, be able to take (have room), absorb, to understand

(TOP (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أصبح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM القضاء) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM المستعجل)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+ADJ.VN+CASE_DEF_NOM المخالف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لأصول))))))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يستوعب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC عددا) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC كبيرا)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN القضاة))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: -NONE- > urgent justice that goes against common law
